definition: tending to soothe or tranquilize, a drug used to reduce stress or tension without reducing mental clarity
details:
adjective
- tending to soothe or tranquilize
= synonyms: tranquilizing
noun
- a drug used to reduce stress or tension without reducing mental clarity
= synonyms: tranquilizer, tranquillizer, tranquilliser, antianxiety agent, ataractic drug
